entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story. He is trying to escape from a tunnel and is being cautious not to be discovered.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A friend of Harry's who is helping him in his escape. She reminds him to put on the Cloak to remain hidden.

entities.name: nagini
entities.description: A snake that is being kept in an enchanted, starry sphere in a room ahead of Harry and Hermione. It is described as swirling and coiling like a serpent underwater.

entities.name: the cloak
entities.description: A magical object that allows the wearer to remain hidden. Hermione reminds Harry to put it on to avoid being discovered.

relationships.description: Hermione is helping Harry in his escape by reminding him to put on the Cloak and being cautious not to be discovered.
Harry puts on the Cloak to remain hidden while escaping from the tunnel.
